name: automerge-wasm
description: wasm-bindgen bindings to the automerge rust implementation

scripts.build: rimraf ./dev && wasm-pack build --target nodejs --dev --out-name index -d dev
scripts.release: rimraf ./dev && wasm-pack build --target nodejs --release --out-name index -d dev && yarn opt
scripts.pkg: rimraf ./pkg && wasm-pack build --target web --release --out-name index -d pkg && cd pkg && yarn pack && mv automerge-wasm*tgz ..
scripts.prof: rimraf ./dev && wasm-pack build --target nodejs --profiling --out-name index -d dev
scripts.opt: wasm-opt -Oz dev/index_bg.wasm -o tmp.wasm && mv tmp.wasm dev/index_bg.wasm
